rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT AGE FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE AGE < 0 OR AGE > 120;","active":"Yes","description":"Validate the age column to ensure it falls within a range from 0 to 120, inclusive.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"AGE","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"AGE"}
rules.description: Validate the age column to ensure it falls within a range from 0 to 120, inclusive.

rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT AUTHORITIES_CONTACTED FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE AUTHORITIES_CONTACTED NOT IN ('Fire', 'Police', 'Ambulance', 'Other');","active":"Yes","description":"Check AUTHORITIES_CONTACTED contains valid domain values such as 'Fire', 'Police', 'Ambulance', or 'Other'.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"AUTHORITIES_CONTACTED","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"AUTHORITIES_CONTACTED"}

rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT AUTO_YEAR FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE AUTO_YEAR < 1900 OR AUTO_YEAR > EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE);","active":"Yes","description":"Validate AUTO_YEAR to ensure it falls between 1900 and the current year.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"AUTO_YEAR","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"AUTO_YEAR"}

rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT POLICY_DEDUCTABLE FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE POLICY_DEDUCTABLE <= 0 OR POLICY_DEDUCTABLE > 1000000;","active":"Yes","description":"Ensure POLICY_DEDUCTABLE is a positive number and less than a million.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"POLICY_DEDUCTABLE","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"POLICY_DEDUCTABLE"}

rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT POLICY_STATE FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE NOT REGEXP_LIKE(POLICY_STATE, '^[A-Z]{2}$');","active":"Yes","description":"Ensure POLICY_STATE contains valid two-letter state codes.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"POLICY_STATE","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"POLICY_STATE"}

rules.definition: {"severity":"Medium","ruleQuery":"SELECT SNO, TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT, INJURY_CLAIM, PROPERTY_CLAIM, VEHICLE_CLAIM FROM TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW WHERE TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT != NVL(INJURY_CLAIM,0) + NVL(PROPERTY_CLAIM,0) + NVL(VEHICLE_CLAIM,0);","active":"Yes","description":"Ensure TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT equals the sum of INJURY_CLAIM, PROPERTY_CLAIM, and VEHICLE_CLAIM columns.","threshold":"0","schemaName":"TESTDATA","dataQuery":"select count(*) from TESTDATA.INSURANCE_CLAIMS_RAW","dataQualityDimension":"Validity","ruleTypeLabel":"SQL Query","unit":"Percentage","primaryColumn":"TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT","recordsCount":"0","columnNames":"","successCriteria":"No bad records found","ruleConditionType":"bad records","ruleType":"SQLQuery","percentage":"0","name":"SQL query","id":"","addedFromWizard":true,"operation":">","workSchemaId":"0","columnName":"TOTAL_CLAIM_AMOUNT"}
